message:
SYSTEM: ThesisCarlos3rdYear.pdf: Página 4
Introduction
• Everyday more RDF data is published on the Web
• Mostly via SPARQL endpoints
• Following Linked Data principles
• Currently there are more than13 billion triples in the Web
• http://esw.w3.org/topic/SparqlEndpoints
• http://esw.w3.org/topic/TaskForces/CommunityProjects/LinkingO
penData/DataSets/Statistics
They are not fully connected, i.e. To mash up the data 
it is necessary to query each of the RDF datasets
speaker: SYSTEM
